title: Cryptomorpher
author: Cryptomorpher
content: HeyAre there any API to PAUSE mining on S19 PRO? And Start/unpause mining later.AFAIK we dont have SSH access but maybe some RPC. Avalon e.g. has such functionalityThanks

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: There is a sleep mode option in the mining configuration it stops mining but the fan would still be running at low speed. So what do you want to achieve?Do you want to automate it for solar power?I can't seem to find an API command yet but I guess it uses Cgminer API check the APIs below- https://github.com/ckolivas/cgminer/blob/master/API-READMEOr instead, try to check awesomeminer managing tool and I think they do have feature to auto sleep and start the miner when needed.

comments.author: Cryptomorpher
comments.body: Thanks mate for replyI try to turn off mining when electricity price is too high.

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: Quote from: Cryptomorpher on November 29, 2022, 06:45:29 PMThanks mate for replyI try to turn off mining when electricity price is too high.The only problem is if you are going to use Awesomeminer you will need to use their modded firmware and flash it to your unit to enable SSH and Privilege API.Another option is by flashing your unit with Braiins OS to get more features like schedule shutdown/power off the miner and schedule when you need to run it again.

comments.author: Artemis3
comments.body: We do have API pause resume.

comments.body: Which state and what's the source of power cost?We do have an in-house solution for ERCOT power cost for Bitmain S19 running factory firmware.PM me if interested.
